job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltugtltstronggtJob ResponsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtData science is in GAINSystems DNA Our founder was an industrial engineering professor and we remain a company of datadriven analysts and engineers Although your daily tasks will vary you will have the following responsibilitiesltbrgtltulgtltligtLead research and data science projects that convert models into operational valueltligtltligtWork with our professional services team to identify viable valuable datadriven projectsltligtltligtDeliver fully functional tested product prototypesltligtltligtCollaborate with product managers and engineers to define the product and technical roadmapsltligtltligtContribute to extending our machine learning infrastructureltligtltligtYou will have the opportunity though not necessarily the responsibility to independently identify research projectsltbrgtltligtltulgtltugtltstronggtCandidate RequirementsltbrgtltstronggtltugtltulgtltligtIntellectual curiosity to explore questions answerable with dataltligtltligtPassion for experimentationltligtltligtCommitment to delivering datadriven resultsltligtltligtStrong statistical computational and mathematical foundationsltligtltligtExcellent communication verbal and written skills and ability to collaborate with teammates with heterogeneous technicalquantitative backgroundsltligtltligtBachelors and graduate degrees in a quantitative fieldltligtltligtAcademic or industrial experience with data science andor machine learningltligtltligtDemonstrated experience with datadriven researchltligtltligtFluent in SQL and Python or RltligtltligtNLP reinforcement learning andor GAN experienced desiredltligtltligtJava and graph DB familiarity preferred but not requiredltbrgtltligtltulgtAt GAINSystems we recognize that diversity and inclusion make our teams stronger We are committed to equal employment opportunity and welcome everyone regardless of race color ancestry religion national origin age sex gender identity sexual orientation disability marital status domestic partner status veteran status or medical condition We encourage people from all backgrounds to applyltbrgtltbrgtPowered by JazzHRltbrgtltbrgthCPyowIzLO
